item.description: I am an Assistant Professor at the Department of Economics at PUC-Rio. My research interests lie at the intersection of Development, Politics, and Environmental Economics. I connect theory-driven questions to granular data and natural experiments to learn about the process of development in low- and middle-income countries. I have co-founded and lead the data team at Base dos Dados, a nonprofit start-up with the mission to make access to high-quality data universal in Brazil.
